name: Writing.com | Dark night theme v1.3
description: A simple dark theme for writing.com. Besides changing the text and background color to night tones it also inverts the colors of all png and gif images and reduces their saturation (many of the original icons has white artifacts around them that looks ugly on a dark background, so the filters are a must). You can hide or show the upper banner in the customization button. v1.0 - Final version.
